about.translators_description: A huge thank you to all of these translators for making this project as accessible as possible
about.administrators_description: These users are people that help offer higher level support for the bot
about.developers_description: These are the core contributors to the project
about.owners_description: This is the owner of Prosperity
about.bot_description: Prosperity is a levelling bot ready to skill up and boost up your Discord server. We pride ourselves on openness, transparency and collaboration

ignoredchannels.channel_now_ignored: %channel% will be ignored from gainin' xp
ignoredchannels.channel_now_not_ignored: %channel% will nay be ignored from gainin' xp

ignoredroles.role_now_ignored: %role% will be ignored from gainin' xp
ignoredroles.role_now_not_ignored: %role% will nay be ignored from gainin' xp

language.choice_message: Please choose below whether you want to set your own language, or the server language

level.not_spoken_yet: Ye 'ave nay spoken where th' bot can see ye yet
level.your_current_level:
Yer current level be **%level%**
Ye need **%xp%** xp to get to th' next level
level.user_current_level:
%user%'s current level be **%level%**
They need **%xp%** xp to get to th' next level

levelroles.role_already_used: %role% already bein' used fer a level
levelroles.level_must_be_positive: Level must be a positive number
levelroles.role_granted_status:
%role% will be granted at **Level %level%**
**Status**:
Currently addin' 'tis role t' %amount% members
levelroles.role_granted_status_complete:
%role% will be granted at **Level %level%**
**Status**:
Added role t' %amount% members
levelroles.role_not_used: %role% nay is bein' used fer a level
levelroles.role_removed: %role% will no longer be granted at **Level %level%**

levels.user_doesnt_exist: %user% nay has spoken since th' bot be added
levels.level_to_give_must_be_positive: Levels t' give mus' be a positive number
levels.level_to_take_must_be_positive: Levels t' take mus' be a positive number

settings.notification_channel_updated: Successfully updated level up notifications t' be sent in %channel%
settings.notification_type_reply_description: Send th' level up message by replyin' to th' message that triggered th' level up
settings.notification_type_channel_description: Send th' level up message in a set channel
settings.notification_type_dm_description: Send th' level up message via direct messages
settings.please_select: Please select th' type o' notifications ye want below...
settings.role_type_stacked: Users will now 'ave stacked roles n' thar previous roles will nay be removed
settings.role_type_single: Users will now have single roles n' thar previous roles will be removed
settings.multiplier_set: 'Tis guild now has a **%multiplier%x** multiplier assigned
settings.delay_set: You have set the delay for xp to **%delay%** seconds

whitelabel.whitelabel_bot_not_active: You currently do not have a whitelabel bot assigned

xp.user_doesnt_exist: %user% nay has spoken since th' bot be added

xp.xp_to_take_must_be_positive: Xp t' take mus' be a positive number
